trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised when you click on a selected control or a designer region in a selected control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> 선택한 컨트롤이 나 선택된 컨트롤의 디자이너 영역을 클릭할 때 발생 하는 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>이벤트는 디자인 화면에 컨트롤에 대해 특정 작업에 대 한 디자이너 호스트에 의해 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you click a selected control or a designer region in a selected control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 선택한 컨트롤 또는 디자인 화면에서 선택한 컨트롤의 디자이너 영역을 클릭할 때 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>처리 하는 기본 대리자를 제공 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you click a selected control or a designer region of a selected control at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 선택 된 컨트롤 또는 선택 된 컨트롤의 디자이너 영역을 클릭 하면 디자이너 호스트를 초기화 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>개체에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>이벤트 유형 및 집합의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs 속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that you clicked a designer region, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class passes the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>개체의 기본 대리자 디자이너 영역을 클릭 했음을 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>를 DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs 개체를 전달 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when you click a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에서 파생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>재정의 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>메서드 디자인 호스트에서 컨트롤을 클릭할 때 발생 하는 이벤트를 처리 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to, if any.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>속성이 있는 경우 이벤트 적용 되는 컨트롤 디자이너 영역을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property represents the location on the design surface that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>속성 클릭 된 디자인 화면에서 위치를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 및 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 및 대리자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified region and location.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"> </xref> 된 지정 된 영역 및 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>대리자 메서드 DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs 생성자를 사용 하 여 초기화 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>개체와 함께 사용할은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: When you click a control region at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 컨트롤 영역을 클릭 하면 디자이너 호스트를 초기화 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>개체에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>이벤트 유형 및 집합은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>속성을는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that was clicked; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 영역을 클릭 합니다. <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*> 초기화 하는 데 사용

trans-unit.source: The location that was clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.
trans-unit.target: 영역의 왼쪽된 위 모퉁이 기준으로 클릭 한 위치 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*> 초기화 하는 데 사용

trans-unit.source: Gets the location within the control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 클릭 된 컨트롤 내에서 위치를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Location property contains the coordinates that identify where you clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region.
trans-unit.target: Location 속성 위치를 클릭 한 영역의 왼쪽된 위 모퉁이 기준으로 식별 하는 좌표를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Location property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 위치 속성에 의해 초기화 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> identifying the location within the region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> 클릭 된 영역 내에서 위치를 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: 있는 경우 클릭 된 디자이너 영역을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Region 속성 있는 경우 클릭 한 컨트롤 디자이너 영역을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 영역 속성에 의해 초기화 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the click event applies to, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no region was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> click 이벤트 적용 되는 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 지역이 클릭 합니다.
